properties.entry: The Administrator manage the entire system. He has available all sections and all actions

An Operator can do backup duties over clients with his same category. He can manage his client jobs, pools, manage configuration change over defined storages and also can create advanced backup process launching the Wizard
An User can view the backup jobs of clients assigned to his same category
The advanced backup coordinator manage the general parameters, of higher level, of an advanced backup process: steps and templates
The Advanced storage kind administrator can establish the suitable advanced storage kinds which WBSAirback could connect with and also the specific commands for defined steps for each case
The Application and System Inventory administrator manages the operative systems and applications available on the system, along with the associated script processes
The Remote Storage Systems administrator manage the specific advanced storage systems which WBSAirback can connect with
The Global Operator manages the full backup module, with same rights as an administrator
The Storage Manager has full access to the Storage module, with same rights as an administrator
The Backup Coordinator establish filesets, schedules and the available storages for making backup
The CDP manager has full access to this module, with same rights as an administrator

In this section you can adjust the overall system as the master password or resetting of some services.

You can enable access via HTTPS to encrypt the data transferred between the browser and this product. Basic form will use a self-created digital certificate, however you can specify another certificate which should be a file in PKCS#12 (P12).
If you enable secure, it disables the insecure HTTP access so only you can access through HTTPS using port TCP/443.
You can then stop and start managing some of the services of the product and the overall system.
The system will shut down in seconds.
Are you sure you turn off the system?
The system will restart in seconds
If you stop the services or system, some applications may stop working your organization. Do not use this option unless you are absolutely sure what it does.

In this section you can adjust the system network, defining both directions as routes or interfaces.

Proxy server configuration page. To disable proxy server, please leave blank server form.

The system clock is the notion of machine time. In this sense, time also includes the passage of days on the calendar. The system clock is typically implemented as a simple account of a number of ticks since an arbitrary starting date, called the "epoch". Unix and POSIX systems encode the time and the number of seconds since the start of the "epoch" in 1970-01-01 00:00:00 Z.

NTP is an Internet protocol to synchronize the clocks of computer systems by sending packet networks with variable latency. NTP uses Marzullo's algorithm with the UTC time scale. NTP service for this product has a phase tracking loop implemented in the kernel of the operating system for better performance.

Removing a disk from a pool could cause severe performance issues, inactivity periods or even data lost. Do not do this if you are not absolutely sure of what you are doing. Are you sure removing selected device from pool?
Physical used space shows real space at aggregate composing device(s) level, which is being used by data
Saved ratio is a global value composed by deduplication ratio and compression ratio (f.deduplicación*f.compresión)
This value shows the unique data amount present at deduplication tables of this aggregate
This value shows the amount space should be used if no deduplicaton mechanism was present
Saved space is the difference between theoretical used space and the real used space by an aggregate with activated deduplication on its volumes

This value shows filesystem used space. It is composed by the greatest value for each volume of: reservation or used space (used by data + used by snapshots). This value, with deduplication enabled, can be greater than aggregate size, because this used space counts logical total data, not physical (real) deduplicated data
This value shows what the aggregate has available for new filesystem purposes. It limits new or extended reservations
This value shows real space at device(s) level, that has not been used by data

There is no restoring type selected
Selecting a date is required to restore by date
Selecting a job version is required to restore by version
The schedules represent the agendas in which the job should be implemented.

The full backup makes a complete copy of the files of the client. This type occupies the full size copy in the repository and consume vast network resources in relation to the number and size of files copied.

The incremental backup backs up only files modified since the last backup on the client. So this kind of copying is that occupies less space in the repository, although the recovery may be slower compared with the total or differential copies.
The differential copy makes a copy only files modified since the last full backup on the client. This type of backup offers fast recoveries, but it takes much more space in the repository.

The virtual copy use previous copies to generate a full backup without having to actually copy the files from the client, so that while occupying the same space as a full backup, does not consume network resources.
Days of planning for full backup
Days of planning for incremental backup
Days of planning for differential copy
Days of planning for virtual copy

The jobs are the backups made, correctly or not, for a user.

This product can operate in high availability mode if you have another product
on your network. Two identical products can form a group and run active-passive mode, avoiding that in case one has a fault, the service they provide is interrupted.

By creating a group, the two products act as a single product, and it must use a virtual IP address you should indicate below. Remember that this address must be within the range of network addresses to which belong the two products.
In your network there is another product
and he has sent a request from address
to form a group. Do you want to accept the application?
that is clustered, has sent a request from the address ungrouped
. Remember that this will eliminate the high availability functionality of this product. Do you want to accept the application?
This product has made a request of rupture or grouping and is awaiting response.
Successful cluster request, you must complete the grouping by using another product management clustered.
Fill in the other node ip address
Click the icon to search to find similar products in the network.
By grouping these products, you can only operate with one of them (the Master) and the other will remain subordinate to this.

which is present on the same network.
Request confirmed from here, you will have to perform all operations with the master node, this team will only act as a slave.
Request rejected, the clustering is not performed.
Request properly abandoned, no state has communicated to another product.

Here you can list and register complementary subscription services for this product.

Product registration does not imply any commitment or cost of using the product. The registration process associates the local identifier to a specific organization in our database, this is important to add subscription services. If you do not add subscription services, registration helps us to collect statistics of usage of our solutions.

The product registration is required for hire subscription services or use any online ImagineWBS services. You may use your ImagineWBS customer number, or make a new record that will be associate to your company registration. This registration helps us to colect statistical data and send interesting communications to product users, also enables ImagineWBS services customers to use service tools.
License is required to manage this section
Support license is not available and is required for updates
You must register the product to upgrade

Here you can view and run the software updates that may be suitable for the system. Remember that version updates may require specialist support due to integration and operational incompatibilities with other services.
